content:
Sure, here's a table with the books, authors, brief descriptions, and ratings:

| Book Title | Author | Description | Rating |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| The Immortalists | Chloe Benjamin | Four siblings learn the exact date of their deaths | 4/5 |
| The Postmortal | Drew Magary | A cure for aging is discovered, allowing people to live indefinitely | 4/5 |
| Altered Carbon | Richard K. Morgan | Human consciousness can be transferred between bodies, allowing immortality | 4.5/5 |
| Old Man's War | John Scalzi | Seniors join the military and are given new bodies to fight in an interstellar war | 4/5 |
| The City and the Stars | Arthur C. Clarke | People live indefinitely in a future city called Diaspar | 4.5/5 |

I hope that helps! Keep in mind that ratings and reviews are subjective, so your mileage may vary.
